entry.title: 3M SB22894 - Scotch-Brite Exl Unitized Wheel, 5 in x 1/2 in x 1/4 in 2S Fin, , Spr 018637A, Sb22894 7000120937
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 20.51

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite EXL Unitized Wheel, 5 in x 1/2 in x 1/4 in 2S FIN, 10 per case, SPR 018637A,

  • Scotch-Brite EXL Unitized Wheels feature a soft, conformable consistency that effectively smoothes, deburrs and finishes the edges of metal alloys, as well as many plastics and composites
  • There are a variety of densities and grades starting from a very soft 2 density for applications requiring a conformability to a hard, aggressive 8 density for maximum cut and durability.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Wheel edge can be dressed for effective deburring, finishing and polishing of all metal alloys and many plastics and composites
  • Tough, layered, unitized construction can operate clockwise or counterclockwise directions
  • Densities and grades ranging from soft and conformable to hard and aggressive offer utility for a wide variety of applications
  • Resists smearing for cleaner surfaces and less preparation
  • Minimizes heat build up to lessen impact on heat-sensitive materials
    		•

entry.title: 3M SB07744 - Scotch-Brite Bench Motor Wheel 07744, Sb07744 7000120887
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 36.73

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Bench Motor Wheel 07744, 5 per case

  • The Scotch-Brite™ Bench Motor Wheel is a unitized wheel that cleans and finishes in a single step
  • It is excellent for cleaning, deburring, blending, finishing or polishing all types of metals, composites, or plastics, and is primarily used on fibreglass parts in automotive shops
  • You can use this wheel on a bench grinder to make it easier to manipulate the workpiece for optimal cleaning and polishing.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Tough, layered, unitized construction deburrs and finishes in one step
  • Non-woven fibers preserve contours and create a consistent finish
  • Heat resistance lessens impact on heat-sensitive materials
  • Wheel edge can be dressed to fit the application
  • Medium grit aluminum oxide cuts fast and is suitable for a range of materials
  • 6-inch wheel with 1-inch center hole and telescoping adapter fits bench grinders
    		•

entry.title: 3M SB18392 - Scotch-Brite Metal Finishing Wheel, 14 in x 4 in x 8 in 5A Med, Sb18392 7000120850
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 811.64

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Metal Finishing Wheel, 14 in x 4 in x 8 in 5A MED, 1 per case

  • Scotch-Brite Metal Finishing Wheel combines conformability with consistent abrasive cutting action to provide uniform brushed stainless and satin finishes
  • Our Metal Finishing Wheel is also used effectively to blend and match #3 or #4 mill finishes on stainless steel and to create brushed or satin finishes on items such as cutlery, appliance trim, builders hardware, and plumbing fixtures.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • High conformability and uniform wear provides consistent cutting power to produce superior satin, mill and brushed finishes
  • Open-web construction resists loading and runs cool to provide professional results on stainless steel, brass, aluminum and other metals
  • Controlled abrasive action helps prevent undercutting or gouging
  • Highly conformable wheel effectively finishes irregular or contoured surfaces
  • Convolute construction wound around a fiber core runs smooth to provide fine, uniform finishing
    		•

entry.title: 3M SB18308 - Scotch-Brite Cut And Polish Unitized Wheel, 2 in x 1 in x 1/4 in 7A Crs, Sb18308 7000120842
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 11.82

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Cut and Polish Unitized Wheel, 2 in x 1 in x 1/4 in 7A CRS, 15 per case

  • The Scotch-Brite™ Cut and Polish Unitized Wheel is a tightly layered, durable unitized wheel available in medium to hard densities
  • This wheel works well for aggressive deburring, blending, and finishing on harder metals and for applications where portability is needed
  • The wheel provides an excellent starting point for jobs requiring the availability of small diameters and narrow widths.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Durable, aggressive wheel for tough blending, finishing, and deburring on harder metals like stainless steel, carbon steel, high nickel alloys
  • High concentration of abrasive mineral is fast cutting and consistently produces a bright finish throughout the life of the wheel
  • Flexible, non-woven construction provides controlled abrasive action that helps prevent undercutting or gouging
  • Tightly layered, unitized construction can operate in clockwise or counterclockwise directions
  • Scotch-Brite material resists loading and wears at a uniform rate to provide continuous cutting action
    		•

entry.title: 3M SB02965 - Scotch-Brite Cut And Polish Wheel, 8 in x 1 in x 3 in 5A Fin, Sb02965 7000120812
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 126.81

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Cut and Polish Wheel, 8 in x 1 in x 3 in 5A FIN, 3 per case

  • The Scotch-Brite™ Cut and Polish Wheel is built to be durable for aggressive blending and finishing, defect removal, and heavy scratch blending
  • This wheel features aluminum oxide mineral incorporated into non-woven nylon or other synthetic fibres
  • Its open-web material is load-resistant and keeps the abrasive cutting at high performance by helping prevent fibre clogging
  • Use the Scotch-Brite™ Cut and Polish Wheel to help remove surface defects, coarse grindlines, forging marks, and machining mismatches — all while helping leave a uniform grain finish.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Non-woven web construction helps resist premature loading, contributing to longer service life
  • Aluminum oxide abrasive mineral cuts fast and consistently produces a bright finish throughout the life of the wheel
  • Scotch-Brite™ material resists loading and wears at a uniform rate to provide continuous cutting action
    		•

entry.title: 3M SB13183 - Scotch-Brite Multi-Finishing Wheel, 8 in x 1 in x 3 in 2S Med, Sb13183 7000120807
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 78.02

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Multi-Finishing Wheel, 8 in x 1 in x 3 in 2S MED, 3 per case

  • The Scotch-Brite™ Multi-Finishing Wheel is a convolute-constructed wheel that provides cleaning and final finishing for stainless steel, aluminum, brass, copper, and other metals
  • The combination of silicon carbide abrasive and soft density make the wheel well-suited for final finishing applications where a high degree of conformability and less density are needed.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Silicon carbide abrasive and open web technology make this wheel ideal for final finishing
  • Convolute construction provides a balanced, smooth running wheel throughout product life
  • Open, non-woven web construction runs cool and lessens impact on heat-sensitive materials
  • Moderate aggressiveness and lighter density provide controlled wear for consistent results over the life of the wheel

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 72.50

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Clean and Strip Cup Wheel, 4 in x 5/8-11 7S XCS, 4 per case

  • The Scotch-Brite™ Clean and Strip Cup Wheel is well suited for removing weld discolouration and splatter
  • This wheel's open web construction and aggressive silicon carbide mineral abrasive makes it ideal for removing scale, rust, surface contaminants, paints, and other coatings
  • The wheel runs more smoothly than a wire cup brush or cup stone, and it also resists loading when removing soft coatings
  • This wheel includes a threaded attachment that fits right angle tools and prevents interference from mounting hardware during use.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Low conformability and extra coarse abrasive provides strong cutting action without damaging the base material
  • Integrated attachment prevents interference from mounting hardware during use
  • Multi-llayered design provides extended life over single layered versions
  • Resists loading and heat build-up allowing prolonged operation and producing consistent results over the life of the product
